Future Retail Ltd (FRL) is convening the meetings of its shareholders and creditors in late April to approve the sale of its retail assets to Reliance Retail.

articles.title: Tata Motors model wise sales in February 2022 - Punch, Nexon and more - Zee News
articles.description: Automakers in India to increase vehicle prices in April 2022, details here Among Tata s hatchbacks - the Tiago and the Altroz - sales dropped in February 2022 as the Tiago s sales figure for February 2022 was 4,489 units, a drop of 33.86 percent year-on-year.
